message: What's everyone using to plan their startup? I don't mean an ide, I'm thinking there must be a web app that allows you build a scope, feature lists, plan dev and deployment schedules etc. should also make it easy to communicate with your beta users. Anyone using something like this?
Great round up of startup tools by Steve Blank http://steveblank.com/tools-and-blogs-for-entrepreneurs/
PivotalTracker do most of the jobs. http://www.pivotaltracker.com
